translation.it: Signore, un nostro veicolo è stato rubato, L67.

translation.en: All units. Suspects traveling. MP vehicle L67.
translation.it: A tutte le unità, sospettati in movimento. Veicolo militare L67.

translation.en: Primary is Jack Reacher. White. Male. 40s. Considered armed and dangerous.
translation.it: Il primo è Jack Reacher. Bianco, sui 40 anni. Armato e pericoloso.

translation.en: Secondary is Major Susan Turner. Female. Wearing military fatigues.
translation.it: Il secondo è il maggiore Turner. Donna, indossa una tuta militare.

translation.en: White. Age 34.
-Really? -Shut up.
[Turner] We need to ditch this car and get into my email.
translation.it: Lasciamo l'auto, devo accedere alle mie e-mail.

translation.en: All right, people, let's go, let's go! Where the hell are they?
Specialist, have the State Troopers called back yet?
On it, sir.
All right, has anybody heard from the Capitol Police? Anybody? Anything? A location? Something?
translation.it: Notizie dalla polizia del Campidoglio o da altri? Un luogo, qualcosa!

translation.en: Is there still an Internet cafe around here?
translation.it: C'è ancora un Internet Cafè da queste parti ?

translation.en: [driver] Pennsylvania and North Street. [Turner] Okay. Take us there, please.
translation.it: - Tra la Pennsylvania e North Street. - Ci porti lì.

translation.en: I should have gone to Afghanistan myself.
translation.it: Sarei dovuta andare io in Afghanistan.

translation.en: Mirkovich and Cibelli were my responsibility.
translation.it: Mirkovich e Cibelli erano sotto la mia responsabilità.

translation.en: The job is about giving orders.
translation.it: Il lavoro consiste nel dare ordini.

translation.en: You ever lose anyone on your watch, Reacher?
translation.it: Hai mai perso qualcuno quando eri al comando?

translation.en: My men weren't killed by the Taliban.
translation.it: I miei uomini non sono stati uccisi dai Talebani.

translation.en: They were shot, in the back of the head,
with slugs from an Army-issued 9 mm.
translation.it: con una nove millimetri in dotazione all'Esercito.

translation.en: By one of our own.
I'm gonna find out who did it.
What were your guys doing over there? What were they looking for?
translation.it: Che facevano i tuoi uomini lì? Cosa cercavano?

translation.en: Weapons.
Thousands of weapons, decommissioned during the drawdown.
translation.it: Migliaia di armi, ritirate durante la smobilitazione.

translation.en: Whole plane load's gone missing.
translation.it: Il carico di interi aerei sparito.

translation.en: Hey, I like your hat.
You a Nats fan? Yeah, from the beginning.
translation.it: - È un fan dei Nationals? - Sì, dall'inizio.

translation.en: They arrested me the day after my investigators were killed.
translation.it: Mi hanno arrestata il giorno dopo l'uccisione dei miei uomini.

translation.en: With the time difference, they might have filed another report.
translation.it: Con il fuso orario, potrebbero aver inviato un altro rapporto.

translation.en: They locked me up so I wouldn't see it.
translation.it: Mi hanno rinchiusa per impedirmi di vederlo.

translation.en: Sir, she's trying to access the system.
translation.it: Signore, sta tentando di accedere al sistema.

translation.en: -Get me that location. -Yes, sir.
Pennsylvania and North Street.
[Morgan] It's Morgan. Ready to go to work, soldier?
translation.it: Sono Morgan. Pronto a lavorare, soldato?

translation.en: We've located them. They're at an Internet cafe, Pennsylvania and North Street.
translation.it: Sono in un Internet Cafè, Pennsylvania e North Street.

translation.en: Get it done.
[Turner] Whatever Mirkovich and Cibelli found out got them killed. But by who?
translation.it: Mirkovich e Cibelli sono stati uccisi per ciò che avevano scoperto. Ma da chi?

translation.en: -[beep] -Shit. They locked me out.
translation.it: ACCESSO NEGATO Merda. Mi hanno tagliata fuori.

translation.en: They're gonna triangulate this I.P. address. I know. Just give me a second. Okay?
translation.it: - Individueranno l'indirizzo IP. - Lo so, dammi un secondo.

translation.en: -They will know this location. -Let me try one last thing.
translation.it: - Ci troveranno. - Faccio un ultimo tentativo.

translation.en: -They will know this location. -Shit.
[Turner] There's a bus stop on the other side of the park.
translation.it: C'è una fermata dall'altra parte del parco.

translation.en: We're being followed.
It's not a cop.
He's a pro.
Where?
Fifty yards.
Black coat, brown hair.
There.
-They made us. -Maybe.
[Reacher] Restaurant.
We're meeting someone in the back.
-Everybody out! -Let's go!
-Out! -Move!
[Turner] Come on! Go, go!
I got this door.
Stay back! Stay back!
No, don't. Stay back!
Police! Freeze!
Drop your weapon.
Sir, I said drop your weapon.
translation.it: Signore, ho detto di buttare l'arma.

translation.en: I'm military police!
[coughs] He's not a cop!
[officer] Sir, drop your weapon! I'm military police.
translation.it: - Signore, butti l'arma! - Sono della Polizia Militare.

translation.en: Sir, I need you to drop your weapon.
Listen, I know what this looks like. [officer] Sir, turn around and let me see your hands!
translation.it: - So come sembra. - Si volti e metta le mani sulla testa!

translation.en: I'm putting my weapon down. Listen to me.
I'm military police. These two are fugitives of the United States Army.
translation.it: Sono della Polizia Militare. Questi sono fuggitivi dell'Esercito degli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: I understand. I'm turning around.
Place your hands behind your head. Now!
translation.it: Metta le mani dietro la testa. Subito!

translation.en: My identification's in my right front pocket. Will you just check it?
translation.it: Il mio tesserino è nella tasca destra, controlli.

translation.en: Just check.
Go! Move, move! Go!
[Turner] We got our signals crossed.
He's good.
We'll get him next time.
You know, I admit to being a little jealous when we talk.
translation.it: Lo ammetto, ero invidiosa quando parlavamo al telefono.

translation.en: Go where you want.
Eat when you want. [scoffs]
Nobody telling you what to do or how to do it.
translation.it: Nessuno ti dice cosa fare o come farlo.

translation.en: It's definitely not the Army way.
Exactly.
Let's take a look at that registration.
[Turner] Parasource? You think that guy in the kitchen was one of theirs?
translation.it: Parasource? Credi che quello della cucina fosse uno di loro?

translation.en: [Reacher] Freelance is my guess.
Go.
Made a mess, I hear.
This Reacher guy is interesting.
You have no idea. They ran out of medals.
translation.it: Non ne hai idea. Non avevano più medaglie.

translation.en: So don't make this a competition.
Too late.
Sure you can handle him by yourself?
translation.it: Sicuro di potertene occupare da solo?

translation.en: I can handle him just fine.
Prove it.
-Coffee? -Cream?
Right sizes.
Good eye.
I spent the rest of our cash.
It's time we stopped running and start hunting.
translation.it: Smettiamo di fuggire e cominciamo a cacciare.

translation.en: -[telephone ringing] -Morgan. [Reacher] Catch you at a bad time?
I hope you're calling to turn yourselves in.
I don't know your role in this yet, Colonel. I'm guessing money.
translation.it: Non so quale sia il suo ruolo. Soldi, penso.

translation.en: I promise you I will find out.
Nobody's gonna find anything.
Not even in Major Turner's email?
translation.it: Neanche nelle e-mail del maggiore Turner?

translation.en: -Find it yet? -Nothing to find.
translation.it: MAG. S. TURNER RISERVATO - Trovato? - Non c'è niente da trovare.

translation.en: You're not looking hard enough.
Why don't we check my field reports?
I will snap the tendon before it breaks the bone. It takes longer to heal.
translation.it: Strapperò il tendine prima di spezzare l'osso. Ci mette di più a guarire.

translation.en: Locked. Need the code.
Mirkovich and Cibelli's field reports. What else you got on here, huh?
translation.it: I rapporti di Mirkovich e Cibelli. Che altro c'è qui?

translation.en: You think you're invulnerable.
[Turner] Almost done uploading.
But there are ways to get at you, Reacher.
translation.it: Ma ci sono modi per ferirti, Reacher.

translation.en: Got it.
Thanks for all your help, Colonel.
Okay. Mirkovich and Cibelli did file a final report.
translation.it: Mirkovich e Cibelli avevano inviato un rapporto finale.

translation.en: "Warlords..."
Okay, here we go.
The last man they spoke to was a contractor named Daniel Prudhomme.
translation.it: L'ultimo con cui hanno parlato era un contractor, Daniel Prudhomme.

translation.en: He oversaw weapons transports. Said he was evasive
translation.it: Controllava le spedizioni di armi. Era evasivo...

translation.en: then he disappeared.
-[cell phone ringing] -This is Leach.
This is Sergeant Greene, your old D.I. Remember me?
translation.it: Qui Greene, il suo vecchio istruttore. Si ricorda di me?

translation.en: Sergeant Greene. So good to hear from you.
[Reacher] I'm here with a friend of yours. We need a favor.
translation.it: Sono con una sua amica, ci serve un favore.

translation.en: There's a military contractor called Parasource.
translation.it: C'è una ditta di contractor, la Parasource.

translation.en: Think you could ask around, find out what role they played in Bagram?
translation.it: Può scoprire che ruolo aveva a Bagram?

translation.en: I might be able to do that.
Also there's a Parasource employee named Prudhomme. We need his whereabouts.
translation.it: C'è anche un dipendente, Prudhomme. Dobbiamo sapere dov'è.

translation.en: Prudhomme. Copy that.
And, Sergeant.
Carefully.
Sir, yes, sir.
Clear.
-[Turner] Hey, stop, hey! -[grunting]
Let go of me!
-Let go of me! Let go! -Hey, hey, hey!
[softly] It's okay. It's okay.
I don't understand. You said you're not a cop.
translation.it: Hai detto di non essere un poliziotto.

translation.en: I'm not.
What's military police?
It's different.
But you stole this car.
[sighs] It's complicated.
Where are you taking me?
We don't know yet.
-Hey, do you have a phone? -Why?
Just give it to me. I left it in the apartment where you kidnapped me.
translation.it: - Dammelo. - L'ho lasciato dove mi avete rapita.

translation.en: We didn't kidnap you.
Kidnapping is a federal offense.
translation.it: Il rapimento è un reato federale.

translation.en: Look at me, kid.
There are people out there who want to hurt you.
translation.it: Ci sono persone che vogliono farti del male.

translation.en: I feel sick.
Just put your head out the window.
It doesn't open. Hey, when was the last time you had something to eat?
translation.it: - Non si apre. - Quando hai mangiato l'ultima volta?

translation.en: -I don't know. -We need to get her some food.
translation.it: - Non lo so. - Prendiamole del cibo.

translation.en: How long have you been drawing?
I don't know. Why?
Just asking.
They suck.
Whatever you say.
Beth and Herb were these two nice old hippies.
translation.it: Beth e Herb erano due vecchi hippy gentili.

translation.en: Who'd want to kill them?
You've had a shock. Your body's pumping adrenaline.
translation.it: Hai avuto uno shock, il corpo sta pompando adrenalina.

translation.en: Cortisol. They call it fight or flight.
It's gonna take a while to calm down.
translation.it: Ci vuole un po' per calmarsi.

translation.en: Here.
I can't eat. I'm pumping adrenaline.
translation.it: Non riesco a mangiare, sto pompando adrenalina.

translation.en: I know a place she'll be safe.
translation.it: C'è un posto dove sarà al sicuro.

translation.en: What does that mean?
I'm not going to a stupid school. They have a dress code. This is what they wear there.
translation.it: - Non vado in una stupida scuola. - Indossano la divisa. Si vestono così.

translation.en: I know the headmistress. You'll be safe there.
translation.it: Conosco la direttrice, lì sarai al sicuro.

translation.en: "Headmistress?" What is it, a convent?
Do you want to live?
Do you?
Yes.
Then you will go where we say and stay until we say it's safe.
translation.it: Allora vai dove ti diciamo e ci resti finché non sarai più in pericolo.

translation.en: Do you understand?
You're very intense. You know that?
Yeah, I understand.
-What are you doing here? -Reacher has the girl.
translation.it: - Che ci fai qui? - Reacher ha la ragazzina.

translation.en: You were supposed to take care of that.
You people. You take off the uniform and lose all discipline.
translation.it: Che gente! Tolta l'uniforme, perdete il senso della disciplina.

translation.en: How did he find her?
Exactly.
How did he?
How would I know? When he was here, earlier today.
translation.it: - E io che ne so? - Quando è stato qui, oggi...

translation.en: You're watching me now? Who the hell do you think you are?
translation.it: Sorvegli me, ora? Chi cavolo credi di essere?

translation.en: What did you give him?
What are you talking about?
What did you give him?
I don't have to be interrogated by the likes of you.
translation.it: Non devo rispondere a quelli come te.

translation.en: He came in here with that bitch and threatened me. I gave him nothing.
translation.it: È venuto con quella stronza a minacciarmi. Non gli ho dato niente.

translation.en: What's so funny?
We hired you to clean up this mess.
translation.it: Ti abbiamo assunto per sistemare questo impiccio.

translation.en: You're right.
He touched this phone, didn't he?
So?
That means his prints are on it. Huh?
[Turner] I mean, really, if I had any other choice...
It should only be for a few days.
You know how we feel about you here at Pembroke, Susan.
translation.it: Sai cosa pensiamo di te qui alla Pembroke, Susan.

translation.en: Well, thank you.
-It's so nice to see you. -It's good to see you, too...
translation.it: - È bello rivederti. - Anche per me.

translation.en: Show me what you feel. You are not a camera.
translation.it: Mostratemi quello che provate. Non siete una macchina fotografica.

translation.en: What do you feel about these hands?
translation.it: Che cosa vi suscitano queste mani?

translation.en: Are these nurturing hands?
Have they held children? Do they carry pain? Why do we draw?
translation.it: Che hanno tenuto un bambino? Trasmettono dolore?

translation.en: Welcome to Pembroke. Hi, I'm Olivia. And I'm May.
translation.it: - Benvenuta alla Pembroke. Io sono Olivia. - E io sono May.

translation.en: Come sit with us.
[Olivia] Where'd you go before this? [Samantha] Different places.
translation.it: - Dove andavi prima? - In posti diversi.

translation.en: [May] Ooh, travel's really good for college applications.
translation.it: Viaggiare va bene per le domande al college.

translation.en: [Olivia] Have you taken the PSATs yet? [May] You need to sign up right away.
translation.it: - Hai già fatto i test? - Devi iscriverti subito.

translation.en: [girl] May! Oh, my God, your earrings! Where'd you get them?
translation.it: May! Mio Dio, quegli orecchini! Dove li hai presi?

translation.en: Oh, thank you. Actually, my dad brought them back from New York.
translation.it: Grazie. Me li ha portati papà da New York.

translation.en: Ah! My parents promised me some intense retail therapy when we're in Paris for Christmas.
translation.it: I miei mi hanno promesso una terapia di shopping, quando andremo a Parigi.

translation.en: Wow, Paris. You guys have been everywhere.
It's beautiful. I've been three times. Have you ever been?
translation.it: È bellissima, ci sono stata tre volte. Tu ci sei stata?

translation.en: -No, actually not. -Can you imagine Christmas?
translation.it: - No. - Te la immagini a Natale?

translation.en: -It's great. The Eiffel Tower. -[May] Have you been in it?
translation.it: - È fantastica, la Torre Eiffel... - Ci sei salita?

translation.en: [Olivia] Yeah, three times, girl!
[girl] Aren't you going to Spain?
[May] You guys are doing a lot of traveling. -It's awesome. -[cell phone buzzes]
I'll probably stick around at home. The usual.
translation.it: Io probabilmente resterò a casa. Il solito.

translation.en: She's gonna do fine.
I don't want you to worry.
What are you doing? You said you didn't have a phone.
translation.it: - Che fai? - Hai detto di non avere il cellulare.

translation.en: How many times did you use this? In my life?
translation.it: - Quante volte lo hai usato? - In tutta la vita?

translation.en: Let's go. Get your things.
It was nothing. Just one person.
translation.it: Non è niente, solo una persona...

translation.en: -Excuse me. We have to go. Thank you. -It was nothing.
translation.it: - Scusate, dobbiamo andare. Grazie. - Non è niente.

translation.en: Nance, give me one second. Hey!
Hey, what the hell is going on?
-She was texting. -[Turner] Shit!
-What's wrong with that? -One, they can trace us.
translation.it: - Che c'è di male? - Possono rintracciarci.

translation.en: Come on, let's go.
[Reacher] Get in.
God, that place was ridiculous.
That place changed my life.
translation.it: Quel posto ha cambiato la mia vita.

translation.en: Sorry about the phone.
Go.
Did some digging about Parasource.
Some of their boys got into trouble in Afghanistan.
translation.it: Alcuni dei loro si sono messi nei guai in Afghanistan.

translation.en: They lost some big government contracts. Word is they're in financial trouble.
translation.it: Hanno perso grandi contratti governativi e ora hanno problemi finanziari.

translation.en: Why does he get to have a phone?
translation.it: Perché lui può avere il telefono?

translation.en: -This Daniel Prudhomme... -Hold on. You need to be quiet.
translation.it: - Questo Daniel Prudhomme... - Un attimo. Silenzio.

translation.en: 'Kay, sorry. Daniel Prudhomme. Keep going.
The contractor our guys talked to, he lives in New Orleans.
translation.it: Il contractor, con cui hanno parlato i nostri, vive a New Orleans.

translation.en: He disappeared right after he was interrogated.
translation.it: È sparito subito dopo essere stato interrogato.

translation.en: Hitched a ride back home to his wife and kids.
translation.it: Ha preso un volo per tornare dalla moglie e i figli.

translation.en: New Orleans is Parasource's home base.
translation.it: A New Orleans c'è la sede della Parasource.

translation.en: They know he's back and they're looking for him.
translation.it: Sanno che è tornato e lo cercano.

translation.en: We're going to New Orleans.
-Sir, there's something else. -Yep?
Colonel Morgan was killed.
translation.it: Il Colonnello Morgan è stato ucciso.

translation.en: Your prints were found on the murder weapon.
translation.it: Hanno trovato le sue impronte sull'arma dell'omicidio.

translation.en: Appreciate your help, Sergeant.
We need to find Prudhomme before Parasource gets a hold of him.
translation.it: Dobbiamo trovare Prudhomme prima della Parasource.

translation.en: There's an airport at Norfolk.
-We'll need credit cards. -And IDs.
translation.it: - Ci servono carte di credito. - E documenti.

translation.en: American Express. Visa.
"Daddy is so happy with my SATs "and extracurricular activities,
translation.it: "Papà è contento del mio test e delle attività extracurricolari.

translation.en: "he's takin' us all to New Orleans."
translation.it: Ci porta tutti a New Orleans."

translation.en: Unless you want me to shut up.
You little shit.
Sure about this?
Want me to do it?
Tan jacket.
Yeah.
-I'm sorry. -Excuse me.
No problem.
Enjoy your flight.
[woman] If you're seated in an emergency exit row, please review the responsibilities for emergency exit seating
translation.it: Se siete seduti vicino a un'uscita di emergenza, vi preghiamo di leggere

translation.en: on the back of the safety information card
located in the seat pocket in front of you.
translation.it: posto nella tasca del sedile di fronte a voi.

translation.en: Haven't flown before?
Here.
You're kidding. I don't want you puking on me.
translation.it: - Scherzi. - Non voglio che mi vomiti addosso.

translation.en: I'm not gonna puke.
Good.
So, how long have you been in the Army for?
-Ten years. -Oh, wow.
-What's your rank? -Major.
So, if you give a guy orders, he has to obey.
translation.it: Così... ...se dai un ordine a un uomo, lui deve obbedire...

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Like, fast.
-Yeah. -[chuckles]
And if he tries messing with you, you know, like, all kinds of moves, right?
translation.it: E se cerca di aggredirti, tu conosci un sacco di mosse, no?

translation.en: A few.
Oh, that's badass.
-[chuckles softly] -Can I learn some?
Sure.
-You're not married, right? -No.
Are you gay?
I mean, it's totally cool. I know tons of lesbians.
translation.it: Non è un problema, conosco tante lesbiche.

translation.en: No, I'm not gay.
I thought all lady soldiers are gay.
translation.it: Credevo che tutte le soldatesse lo fossero.

translation.en: Well, some are, some aren't. Like out in the real world.
translation.it: Alcune lo sono, altre no. Come nella vita normale.

translation.en: So, is Reacher
your boyfriend?
[chuckles] No.
-Friends with benefits. -Uh, no.
You mean no, you don't want to,
or no, he doesn't want to, or no, not yet, you guys haven't really...
translation.it: "no" perché non vuole lui o "no", non avete ancora...

translation.en: All right. I see how it is.
My dad was military.
Really?
Never met him.
He left before I was born.
translation.it: Se n'è andato prima che nascessi.

translation.en: Where was he stationed?
Around D.C., I guess.
What was his name?
Candy won't talk about him.
-Candy? Oh. -My mom.
Just says he was a big hero and a total asshole.
translation.it: Dice solo che lui era un grande eroe e un perfetto stronzo.

translation.en: [flight attendant] We're beginning our descent,
so if you need to stretch your legs or use the lavatories, you should do it now.
translation.it: Chi vuole usare la toilette o sgranchirsi le gambe è pregato di farlo ora.

translation.en: I'll be right back.
It's the haircut.
All you contractors go to the same barber?
translation.it: Voi contractor andate tutti dallo stesso barbiere?

translation.en: Check it.
Oh, he's not feeling well. You might want to use this one.
translation.it: Non si sente bene. Le conviene usare l'altro.

translation.en: Go.
Took two more of your pieces off the board.
translation.it: Ti ho tolto altri due pezzi dalla scacchiera.

translation.en: They were the B team.
What were you? JSOC? SEAL Team?
Something like that. When'd you get back?
translation.it: - Qualcosa del genere. - Quando sei tornato?

translation.en: I'm not sure I ever did. Don't you miss it?
translation.it: Non so se sono tornato. A te non manca?

translation.en: Not a bit.
I think you do, drifter.
People like us, we can never go back to the world.
translation.it: Quelli come noi... non tornano mai alla vita normale.

translation.en: We hurt people.
translation.it: Noi facciamo del male alle persone.

translation.en: And the people around us get hurt.
translation.it: E chi sta intorno a noi si fa male.

translation.en: Leave Turner to me.
Walk away now and I won't hurt the little girl.
translation.it: Vattene e non farò niente alla ragazzina.

translation.en: You coming to New Orleans?
I'm thinking about it.
Look me up.
I will.
-[alarm buzzing] -Stairs. Go, go, go.
Go! Go!
Go.
Go. Go.
Wait, wait, wait!
[announcer over PA] Welcome to Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport.
translation.it: Benvenuti all'Aeroporto Internazionale Louis Armstrong di New Orleans.

translation.en: Now, you're gonna tell me what's going on,
translation.it: Adesso mi dite che sta succedendo,

translation.en: or the first chance I get, I'm gonna scream or grab a policeman.
translation.it: o, alla prima occasione, mi metto a urlare o fermo un poliziotto.

translation.en: -Okay, look... -We're protecting you.
-I found out that some... -Look, you don't...
translation.it: - Ho scoperto che delle persone... - Senti, non...

translation.en: -Can you stop? -Just...
Some people were stealing from the government.
Stealing what?
At this point, the less you know, the better.
translation.it: A questo punto, meno sai, meglio è.

translation.en: Bullshit! I got us the credit card, okay?
translation.it: Stronzate! Ho io trovato le carte di credito, ok?

translation.en: We wouldn't have gotten on that plane without it.
They're after me, too.
Why?
You need to tell her.
They think you're my daughter.
translation.it: Credono che tu sia mia figlia.

translation.en: That's funny?
You're not my father.
How do you know?
Well, why would you think you are?
Because your mother filed a paternity suit with the Army claiming I was.
translation.it: Tua madre lo dice, ha fatto richiesta di riconoscimento all'Esercito.

translation.en: All we have available is a lovely two-bedroom suite, $350 a night. Will that do?
translation.it: Ho solo una suite con due camere da letto. 350 dollari a notte, va bene?

translation.en: [Turner] Yes. Can I pay in cash?
So, we gonna take a DNA test?
Little busy right now.
I got to tell you something.
You're gonna get angry.
This whole thing is my fault.
How's that?
I was the one who made her file the paternity thing.
translation.it: Le ho detto io di fare richiesta per il riconoscimento.

translation.en: I thought maybe she could get something out of it.
Money.
Child support.
Help her get her life together.
translation.it: Per aiutarla a rimettersi in sesto.

translation.en: She's doing better since she got out.
translation.it: Sta meglio da quando è uscita.

translation.en: Got a job.
Maybe she could get a little house.
You're mad.
I can see it in your face.
I'm not mad.
Yes, you are. They think I'm your kid, so you have to worry about protecting me.
translation.it: Sì, invece. Pensano che sia tua figlia e così tu devi proteggermi.

translation.en: Yeah.
So?
So I don't want to be here. So you don't want me here. So I should just leave.
translation.it: Allora, io non voglio stare qui, tu non mi vuoi qui e io me ne vado.

translation.en: Okay.
Where you gonna go?
I got, uh, food.
-Oh, God! -Thanks.
-I'm starving. Thanks. -Yeah.
She's out.
Our dinner date.
Champagne is still chilling.
translation.it: Lo champagne è ancora in fresco.

translation.en: I knew you were the romantic type.
translation.it: Lo sapevo che eri uno romantico.

translation.en: So, Reacher, after those phone calls,
translation.it: Allora, Reacher, dopo le tue telefonate...

translation.en: what exactly did you think would happen?
I thought a nice dinner, maybe some wine.
translation.it: Pensavo... a una bella cena, magari del vino.

translation.en: And after dinner?
Back to your place, maybe.
translation.it: Saremmo andati a casa tua, magari.

translation.en: As opposed to your seedy motel?
translation.it: Invece che nel tuo squallido motel?

translation.en: Never underestimate the charm of a seedy motel.
translation.it: Mai sottovalutare il fascino di uno squallido motel.

translation.en: I can see the appeal.
What do you say we look for a seedy motel once I find Prudhomme?
translation.it: Cerchiamo uno squallido motel dopo che avrò trovato Prudhomme?

translation.en: I'll go with you.
Only one of us should go.
translation.it: Solo uno di noi dovrebbe andare.

translation.en: So I'll go.
No, someone needs to stay here with her.
translation.it: No, qualcuno deve restare con lei.

translation.en: What, because I'm a woman I should be the babysitter?
translation.it: Quindi, visto che sono una donna... ...devo fare la baby-sitter?

translation.en: I don't know how to be the babysitter.
translation.it: Io non so fare il baby-sitter.

translation.en: -You think that I do? -Yes.
[scoffs] You know, I've had to put up with this crap my entire career.
translation.it: Ho dovuto sopportare questa merda in tutta la mia carriera.

translation.en: Forget the dickheads who think that they can paw me, -it's every male officer... -Hey, hey, excuse me.
translation.it: I coglioni che pensano di potermi tastare, e gli ufficiali...

translation.en: ...who thinks that he's smarter and tougher...
translation.it: - Senti... - ...che pensano di essere migliori di me.

translation.en: You've been relieved of command. I am the commanding officer here!
translation.it: Sei stata sollevata dal comando. Comando io qui!

translation.en: You are a fugitive from military justice.
translation.it: Sei una fuggitiva per la giustizia militare.

translation.en: So are you!
So we're both criminals.
I'm going.
That's a bad idea, Major.
[grunts] Thank you.
Mrs. Prudhomme?
Look, I told you people I don't know where he is, okay?
translation.it: Ve l'ho detto, non so dove sia.

translation.en: Mrs. Prudhomme, I'm an MP.
-He's done with all of that. -It's for his own protection.
translation.it: - Lui ha chiuso con quello. - È per la sua sicurezza.

translation.en: He needs my help.
Yeah, well,
he needs all the help he can get, that's for damn sure.
translation.it: ...gli serve tutto l'aiuto del mondo, questo è certo.

translation.en: Does he have any friends? Places?
Places he hangs out.
Any place there's dope is where.
translation.it: Qualsiasi posto in cui ci sia droga.

translation.en: You have a photo?
Yeah.
You can burn it for all I care.
translation.it: Può bruciarla per quanto mi riguarda.

translation.en: Good evening.
You followed me in here.
That was a mistake.
And you didn't think we were watching the wife.
translation.it: Credevi che non sorvegliassimo la moglie.

translation.en: That was a mistake.
Maybe.
So how do you want to do this?
How about one at a time? I get a baseball bat.
translation.it: Che ne dici di uno alla volta? Prendo una mazza da baseball.

translation.en: Where's Turner?
Really? If you were gonna kill me, you would have done it by now.
translation.it: Davvero? Se volevate uccidermi, l'avreste già fatto.

translation.en: Oh, we're not gonna kill you. Not until you beg for it.
translation.it: Non vogliamo ucciderti... finché non ci supplicherai di farlo.

translation.en: And you're gonna beg.
Left or right?
Turner's gonna call me in two minutes.
translation.it: La Turner mi chiamerà tra due minuti.

translation.en: If I don't answer, if I don't pick up, if I sound distressed,
translation.it: Se non parlo, se non rispondo, se sembro agitato...

translation.en: she's in the wind.
You're bluffing.
Go for it.
And now you're wondering how you're gonna make me talk without tipping her off.
translation.it: Ora ti chiedi come farmi parlare senza farlo capire a lei.

translation.en: You can't torture me.
You can't kill me.
And you're definitely gonna have to kill me.
Give me the phone.
Wait. Toss it over.
-[groaning] -Fellas?
I told you people, I don't like being followed.
translation.it: Ve l'ho detto, non amo essere seguito.

translation.en: You're good, Jack!
Killing you isn't gonna be enough, though.
So I'm gonna take back my promise about not hurting the little girl.
translation.it: Perciò mi rimangio la promessa sulla ragazzina.

translation.en: It's never gonna happen.
Sure it is. One day,
she'll be walking home from school
translation.it: ...mentre starà tornando a casa da scuola,

translation.en: or she'll be out on a date
translation.it: o sarà uscita con un ragazzo,

translation.en: or hanging out with her friends.
translation.it: o in giro con gli amici.

translation.en: And you won't be there to protect her.
translation.it: E tu non sarai là... ...a proteggerla.

translation.en: Okay, so let's try it again. This time I want you to take the gun
and hold it lower on your chest, okay? You're holding it a bit too high.
translation.it: e tienila più in basso, ok? Era troppo in alto.

translation.en: -Okay. -So grab it.
Yeah, bring it low. That's right. Now step out and rotate.
translation.it: Sì. Portala giù, bene. Ora staccati e girati.

translation.en: -Nice. Good. -Yeah?
Hi, Reacher. Check this out.
-Ready? -[grunts softly] Yep.
Grab.
-Good. Mmm-hmm. -Yeah?
What do you think?
Well, trust me, if all you have left is that move, just assume you're dead already.
translation.it: Fidati, se ti resta solo quella mossa, è come se fossi già morta.

translation.en: That was good. Let's try again. We're gonna add a kick to the balls into it, okay?
translation.it: Andava bene. Riproviamo e aggiungiamo un calcio nelle palle, ok?

translation.en: Welcome to New Orleans, Captain. I'm Lieutenant Decoudreau.
translation.it: Benvenuto a New Orleans, capitano. Tenente Decoudreau.

translation.en: We're here to help any way we can.
What do you have for me? Guys on the plane were ex-military.
translation.it: - Cosa abbiamo? - I due sull'aereo erano ex militari.

translation.en: Beat up pretty bad.
Do we know who they're working for? Claim to be unemployed.
translation.it: - Per chi lavorano? - Si dichiarano disoccupati.

translation.en: Yeah, right.
I want their bank records, service records, foreign travel,
translation.it: Voglio i loro estratti conto, schede di servizio, viaggi all'estero,

translation.en: gun registration, car registration,
how they like their eggs, their favorite flavor of ice cream. And I want it yesterday.
translation.it: come preferiscono le uova, il gelato preferito. E li voglio per ieri.

translation.en: Sir, yes, sir.
Is she asleep?
I spoke to Prudhomme's wife.
translation.it: Ho parlato con la moglie di Prudhomme.

translation.en: Turns out he's a junkie.
She didn't know where he was.
But she gave me a photo.
translation.it: Ma mi ha dato una foto.

translation.en: Are you more upset that I treated you like a woman
translation.it: Ti dispiace di più perché ti ho trattata da donna...

translation.en: or that I treated you like a man?
translation.it: ...o perché ti ho trattata da uomo?

translation.en: [sighs] I'm upset that I didn't deck you.
translation.it: Mi dispiace di non averti pestato.

translation.en: I should have been the one to go talk to her. I can handle myself. I would've done better.
translation.it: Sarei dovuta andarci io. So badare a me stessa, avrei fatto di meglio.

translation.en: Maybe.
Appreciate the apology.
Is it really so important that you make every decision?
translation.it: È così importante per te prendere tutte le decisioni?

translation.en: Oh, God, you're such a dick. You know...
Okay, I...
I'm used to working alone.
translation.it: ...sono abituato a lavorare da solo. Sono...

translation.en: I'm used to being alone.
Obviously. I'm trying to apologize.
translation.it: - È evidente. - Sto cercando di scusarmi.

translation.en: Go on.
What do you think we should do?
translation.it: Tu cosa credi che dovremmo fare?

translation.en: -Don't patronize me, okay? -I'm asking your opinion.
translation.it: - Non trattarmi dall'alto in basso. - Ho chiesto la tua opinione.

translation.en: Well, we could go to the V.A.
Which is the first place Parasource will look.
How about the local MPs then? Who'll arrest us in a heartbeat.
translation.it: - La Polizia Militare locale? - Ci arresterebbero.

translation.en: Okay, what is your plan then, Reacher?
translation.it: Allora, qual è il tuo piano?

translation.en: See, you don't know what to do.
You're like something feral. You've got their scent in your nose and all you want is blood.
translation.it: Sei come una bestia feroce. Hai sentito il loro odore e vuoi il sangue e basta.

translation.en: You still don't get it, do you?
They killed my men, took away my job, my life!
translation.it: Hanno ucciso i miei uomini, mi hanno tolto il lavoro, la vita!

translation.en: I don't want them as bad as you, I want them more.
translation.it: Non voglio prenderli quanto te, ma più di te.

translation.en: Could you go see if she's up?
translation.it: Puoi vedere se si è alzata?

translation.en: We should get some breakfast, figure out our next move.
translation.it: Dobbiamo fare colazione e decidere come muoverci.

translation.en: -What do we do with the kid? -The kid has a name.
translation.it: - Che facciamo con la ragazzina? - Ha un nome.

translation.en: I know that.
Why are you so tough on her? It's a hard world.
translation.it: - Perché sei così duro con lei? - La vita è dura.

translation.en: The sooner she knows it, the better. You don't think she knows that already?
translation.it: - Prima lo capisce, meglio è. - Non credi che già lo sappia?

translation.en: Reacher, what if she is yours?
translation.it: Reacher... e se fosse tua figlia?

translation.en: Then I should have been there 15 years ago.
translation.it: Allora sarei dovuto stare con lei 15 anni fa.

translation.en: -Nah, she's not here. -[sighs]
-I'll go get dressed. -And go where?
translation.it: - Vado a vestirmi. - Per andare dove?

translation.en: Did she say anything to you? She said she should leave.
translation.it: - Ti ha detto qualcosa? - Ha detto che doveva andare via.

translation.en: What's up?
-Where were you? -Out.
Are you crazy?
-I was trying to help. -How were you gonna help, huh?
translation.it: - Volevo darvi una mano. - In che modo?

translation.en: You guys said Prudhomme's a junkie.
translation.it: - Avete detto che Prudhomme è un tossico. - Non ti abbiamo...

translation.en: -We never told you... -I heard you guys talking.
translation.it: - Avete detto che Prudhomme è un tossico. - Non ti abbiamo... Vi ho sentiti.

translation.en: Some dude on the street said there's a place in the Ninth Ward where homeless vets hang out.
translation.it: Uno mi ha detto che c'è un posto dove vanno i veterani senzatetto.

translation.en: Some old warehouse.
People talk to me. It's a thing. Do you have any idea how dangerous that was?
translation.it: - La gente parla con me, è un fatto. - Sai che rischio hai corso?

translation.en: I told you I can take care of myself.
Fifteen years old, people are looking for you, okay.
translation.it: Hai 15 anni, danno la caccia a te e a noi.

translation.en: When things get hairy, I just pick out the alpha guy.
translation.it: Quando le cose si complicano, io scelgo il maschio alfa.

translation.en: And what, he's supposed to protect you? [chuckles] No, I give him shit.
translation.it: - E lui dovrebbe proteggerti? - No, lo prendo a parolacce.

translation.en: Strong guys don't hurt you. The weak guys do that.
translation.it: Gli uomini forti non ti fanno del male, i deboli sì.

translation.en: Strong guys always have little sisters.
translation.it: Quelli forti hanno sempre una sorellina.

translation.en: Or they want one. I don't know why, that's just how it is.
translation.it: O la vorrebbero. Non so perché, ma funziona così.

translation.en: I'm really tired.
I can't do this.
That was really stupid.
I know.
Please don't ever do that again.
translation.it: Per favore, non farlo mai più.

translation.en: You're welcome.
Hey.
Let's go find Prudhomme.
Excuse me, sir. Can you look at this picture, please?
translation.it: PROGRAMMA PER LA DIPENDENZA DA OPPIACEI Può guardare questa foto, per favore?

translation.en: Well, folks call it the ninth circle of hell.
translation.it: La gente lo chiama "il nono girone dell'inferno".

translation.en: If he's a vet, that's where he's gonna be. Thank you.
translation.it: - Se è un veterano, andrebbe lì. - Grazie.

translation.en: [Reacher] I have money
for Daniel Prudhomme!
How much?
More than he needs.
Well, how much? You know Prudhomme?
It depends. It's a simple question.
[junkie] What do you want with him?
[Reacher] I told you. I want to give him money.
translation.it: Te l'ho detto, voglio dargli dei soldi.

translation.en: [Turner] You are Daniel Prudhomme, right?
Specialist Daniel Prudhomme.
[clears throat] Yes, ma'am. You worked for Parasource.
translation.it: - Sì, signora. - Lavorava per la Parasource.

translation.en: Now, you spoke to two MPs.
Sergeants Mirkovich and Cibelli.
They interviewed you in Bagram.
No. No, I never heard of them.
Sergeants Mirkovich and Cibelli.
Mirkovich had a six-year-old daughter.
translation.it: Mirkovich aveva una figlia di 6 anni.

translation.en: Cibelli's wife is pregnant with their first.
translation.it: La moglie di Cibelli aspetta il primo figlio.

translation.en: Now, you're gonna tell me what happened!
translation.it: Ora tu mi dici... cos'è successo!

translation.en: They'll kill me.
She'll kill you.
Now, we'll protect you. But you have to tell us all of it.
translation.it: Ti proteggeremo, ma devi dirci tutto.

translation.en: Parasource was running truck convoys out of Bagram.
translation.it: La Parasource faceva uscire convogli di camion da Bagram.

translation.en: We just ran security for the base.
All I had to do was just lie and say all the weapons were all accounted for.
translation.it: Dovevo solo mentire e dire che il numero delle armi corrispondeva.

translation.en: They gave me a shitload of money to keep my mouth shut.
translation.it: Mi hanno dato un mucchio di soldi per tenere la bocca chiusa.

translation.en: We're leaving enough shit over there now to start another war.
translation.it: Abbiamo lasciato tanta di quella roba, da far scoppiare un'altra guerra.

translation.en: Parasource was selling off the weapons instead of bringing them back to the States.
translation.it: La Parasource vendeva le armi, invece di riportarle negli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: What went wrong?
Warlords want to renegotiate. Parasource says no.
translation.it: I capi ribelli volevano rinegoziare, la Parasource ha detto di no.

translation.en: Next day, we're driving through those poppy fields.
translation.it: Il giorno dopo, mentre attraversavamo quei campi di papaveri...

translation.en: The whole convoy just gets lit up.
I was scared shitless.
translation.it: Me la facevo sotto dalla paura.

translation.en: Army had to send in a Search and Rescue.
translation.it: L'Esercito ha dovuto mandare una pattuglia di soccorso.

translation.en: Three Search and Rescue dudes get wasted on the way.
translation.it: Tre ragazzi della pattuglia sono rimasti uccisi.

translation.en: Two of the dudes I knew, man.
translation.it: Due di loro li conoscevo bene.

translation.en: What happened after you gave your statement?
translation.it: Che è successo dopo il tuo interrogatorio?

translation.en: Nothing. I told them everything.
translation.it: Niente. Io gli ho detto tutto.

translation.en: There was this guy. He worked for Parasource.
translation.it: C'era un uomo che lavorava per la Parasource.

translation.en: He told me not to worry, that he'd take care of everything.
translation.it: Mi disse di non preoccuparmi, che avrebbe risolto tutto.

translation.en: Next thing I know, I hear they've been killed.
translation.it: Poi ho saputo... ...che erano stati uccisi.

translation.en: I went AWOL. [sniffles]
I hitched a ride back to the States.
translation.it: Ho preso un volo per gli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: I was a dead man if I stayed.
I, uh...
I started shooting up over there.
I figured if I'd just get myself home, you know, I...
translation.it: Ho pensato che, se fossi tornato a casa, ecco...

translation.en: I'd get myself right.
But you didn't.
[Prudhomme] No.
More shit on the streets of New Orleans
translation.it: C'è più roba per le strade di New Orleans...

translation.en: than they're making in Afghanistan.
Something's wrong.
-The numbers don't add up. -What do you mean?
translation.it: - I conti non tornano. - Che vuoi dire?

translation.en: Why put huge government contracts at risk
translation.it: Perché rischiare di perdere grossi contratti governativi vendendo

translation.en: while selling U.S. Army weapons on the black market?
translation.it: Perché rischiare di perdere grossi contratti governativi vendendo armi americane al mercato nero ?

translation.en: Parasource is smarter than that. Yeah, they're smart all right.
translation.it: - La Parasource è più furba. - Sì, sono furbi, eccome...

translation.en: What about on our end? Didn't anybody check to see the crates were empty?
translation.it: E qui in patria? Nessuno controllava per vedere se le casse erano vuote?

translation.en: Probably some dumb guy like me.
We need to get inside one of those transports.
translation.it: Dobbiamo entrare in uno di quegli aerei da trasporto.

translation.en: Plane leaves Bagram every Friday at 0600 hours.
translation.it: L'aereo parte da Bagram ogni venerdì, alle 06:00 del mattino.

translation.en: Six hours to Frankfurt.
Rest, refuel, eleven more to get home.
translation.it: Riposo, rifornimento, altre 11 ore di volo.

translation.en: Jesus, that's 10:00 tonight.
[Lieutenant Decoudreau] And that was without the hot sauce.
translation.it: Ed era senza la salsa piccante!

translation.en: Now, you gotta tell me that was worth it, sir.
translation.it: Mi dica se non ne valeva la pena, signore.

translation.en: Hey, hey, where you at, chief?
-Ooh, you know, you one fine muffaletta! -No, no, no.
translation.it: - Sei proprio un bel bocconcino! - No, no...

translation.en: -No, thank you, ma'am. I'm good. -Wait a minute. Now, don't go depriving a poor girl a taste now.
translation.it: - No, grazie, sono a posto. - Non puoi negarmi un assaggino!

translation.en: I have no money. I don't need your services. -Not today, darling. -Okay.
translation.it: - Non ho soldi e non voglio compagnia. - Oggi no, tesoro.

translation.en: -Well, it's his loss now. -Go on now.
All right.
-Do I have my wallet? -Yeah, I think you're good.
translation.it: - Ho il portafogli? - Sì, credo di sì.

translation.en: All right, I got my wallet.
-You do it? -Just like we negotiated.
-Well? -It's done.
Make the call.
-[cell phone ringing] -[Espin] Is that you?
-No, sir, it's not me. -[ringing continues]
Who is this? I have a witness who can exonerate me.
translation.it: - Chi parla? - Ho un testimone che può scagionarmi.

translation.en: But he has to live first.
Why don't you, uh... Why don't you come in? We'll talk about it.
translation.it: Perché non viene qui e ne parliamo?

translation.en: Will you guarantee his safety? You're not in charge anymore, Major.
translation.it: - Mi garantisce che sarà al sicuro? - Lei non è più al comando, maggiore.

translation.en: Neither are you, apparently. Operatives have been ahead of you this whole time.
translation.it: Neanche lei, pare. Gli operativi arrivano sempre prima di voi.

translation.en: Who were those guys on the plane, hmm?
Who tried to kill me in my cell?
translation.it: Chi ha cercato di uccidermi in cella?

translation.en: Here's a name for you. Parasource.
Here's a couple more names to think about... Baghdad. Basra.
translation.it: E un altro paio di cose su cui riflettere: Baghdad, Basra.

translation.en: It's not our first rodeo, is it, Captain?
translation.it: Non è la nostra prima indagine, vero, capitano?

translation.en: You think I want to be in this position, ma'am? I have a job to do, and I'm gonna do it.
translation.it: Crede che mi piaccia la posizione in cui mi trovo? Ho un lavoro da fare, e lo farò.

translation.en: I'm gonna take a leap of faith that you don't have anything to do with this.
translation.it: Voglio fidarmi e credere che lei non sia coinvolto.

translation.en: Look on the back of the phone. Come alone and make sure you're not tailed.
translation.it: Guardi dietro al cellulare. Venga solo e si assicuri di non essere seguito.

translation.en: [Lieutenant Decoudreau] Decoudreau to Espin. Decoudreau to Espin.
[Espin] This is Espin. Go.
[Lieutenant Decoudreau] We ID'ed those boys on the plane. Paid by a shell company out of the Cayman Islands.
translation.it: Abbiamo identificato i due sull'aereo. Li paga una società delle Cayman.

translation.en: We traced the bank accounts back to a big military contractor, name of...
translation.it: Dai conti bancari, siamo risaliti a un grosso appaltatore di contractor...

translation.en: Parasource.
Yeah. How'd you know that?
Never mind. Uh... Give me everything you can on Parasource, and I mean everything.
translation.it: Non importa. Mi dia tutto sulla Parasource. Intendo tutto.

translation.en: Look, I'm en route to pick up a witness.
translation.it: Sto andando a prelevare un testimone.

translation.en: We'll send backup.
No, stand ready two minutes out. Wait for my signal.
translation.it: No, state pronti a due minuti dal posto. Aspettate il mio segnale.

translation.en: [Lieutenant Decoudreau] That's not procedure, sir.
translation.it: Non è questa la procedura, signore.

translation.en: [Espin] No, that's called an order.
Reacher knows the game. If he smells heat, he'll bolt.
translation.it: Reacher conosce il gioco. Se si insospettisce, sparisce.

translation.en: [Lieutenant Decoudreau] All right, we'll stay two minutes out. What's the address?
translation.it: Bene, ci teniamo a due minuti dal posto. L'indirizzo?

translation.en: [Espin] Nicholls Street Wharf. Espin out.
translation.it: Nicholls Street Wharf. Passo e chiudo.

translation.en: No witnesses.
Freeze! Don't shoot! Don't shoot, man!
Don't kill me. Don't kill me. [stutters] I'm here to help.
translation.it: Non uccidermi, sono qui per aiutarvi.

translation.en: -You're the witness? -Yeah. Yes, yeah, I'm the witness.
translation.it: - Sei il testimone? - Sì, sono il testimone.

translation.en: Where the hell are you?
-You got what you need? -Not good enough.
translation.it: - Ha quello che le serve? - Non mi basta.

translation.en: I suggest you listen to what he has to say.
translation.it: Ascolti quello che ha da dire.

translation.en: -I can help. -Okay. Let's go.
I like stories. Tell me a story.
[narrator on TV] Now we return to our Halloween marathon.
translation.it: Torniamo alla nostra maratona di Halloween.

translation.en: Is your costume ready for tonight's parade?
translation.it: È pronto il costume per la parata di stasera?

translation.en: -I'm gonna call this in. -I'll cover.
Officer down, Nicholls Wharf.
I'm out.
You're still wanted for murder. That's right.
translation.it: - Sei ancora ricercato per omicidio. - È vero.

translation.en: I'm a stone killer. That's why I saved you.
translation.it: Sono un killer spietato. Per questo ti ho salvato.

translation.en: Did Prudhomme give you his statement?
translation.it: Prudhomme ha fatto la sua dichiarazione?

translation.en: Most of it.
Cibelli and Mirkovich were your friends.
translation.it: Cibelli e Mirkovich erano suoi amici.

translation.en: That's right.
Parasource ordered their murders.
translation.it: La Parasource ha ordinato il loro omicidio.

translation.en: They also just tried to kill you.
translation.it: Hanno anche tentato di uccidere lei.

translation.en: They've been providing insurgents with weapons.
translation.it: Aiutano gli insorti vendendo loro le armi.

translation.en: You're gonna need more proof than the word of a dead junkie.
translation.it: Servono prove migliori della parola di un drogato morto.

translation.en: And you're gonna help us get it.
translation.it: E tu ci aiuterai a trovarle.

translation.en: Here. Put the cuffs on, take us into custody.
translation.it: Ci metta le manette, ci arresti.

translation.en: Just get us on the tarmac of Parasource in one hour.
translation.it: Ma ci porti sulla pista della Parasource entro un'ora.

translation.en: I need you to jump to a conclusion here, soldier.
Yeah. Thanks.
Okay, here's what we got.
Six months ago, Parasource loses government contracts worth over a billion dollars.
translation.it: Sei mesi fa la Parasource ha perso contratti per un miliardo di dollari.

translation.en: They're bleeding cash and the banks want blood.
translation.it: Un'emorragia di contanti e la banca li dissanguava.

translation.en: But now, all of a sudden, they start paying back their creditors.
translation.it: Ma, all'improvviso, hanno ricominciato a pagare i debiti.

translation.en: How much money can they be really making selling weapons on the black market?
translation.it: Quanti soldi possono fare vendendo armi al mercato nero?

translation.en: An M4 is, what, five grand?
A rocket launcher's half that.
That's nothing compared to government contracts.
translation.it: Niente in confronto ai contratti governativi.

translation.en: [Espin] So where are they getting the money?
[woman] Guest Services. How may I help you?
Hi, do you have room service?
translation.it: Salve, avete il servizio in camera?

translation.en: I'm sorry, I see you paid cash for your room.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, vedo che avete pagato in contanti.

translation.en: I'm afraid we can't provide incidentals without a credit card.
translation.it: Non possiamo fornire degli extra senza una carta di credito.

translation.en: Uh, yeah, just hold on a second.
You do understand that the parade is coming and it may take a while.
translation.it: C'è la parata e potrebbe volerci un po' per il servizio.

translation.en: [stutters] That's fine. I'm so starving.
Uh... Is Visa okay?
Sir? We got a hit on one of the stolen cards.
translation.it: Signore? Abbiamo un riscontro per una delle carte rubate.

translation.en: It's the girl.
I warned him.
IDs?
Captain Anthony Espin, 110th Military Police.
translation.it: Capitano Anthony Espin, Centodecimo Polizia Militare.

translation.en: I'm gonna have to call this in.
[Reacher] They're unloading the crates. We got to get in there.
translation.it: Stanno scaricando le casse. Dobbiamo intervenire.

translation.en: What's the drill, Major?
Drill is we enforce the law.
translation.it: La procedura è applicare la legge.

translation.en: Seatbelts, please.
-Turner? -Major.
-[man yells] -Stand down! I will lay you down, soldier boy!
translation.it: - Fermi dove siete! - Ti metto a dormire, soldatino!

translation.en: -Get on the ground! -Don't move!
-Weapons down! -Put it down!
Put 'em down, boys, put 'em down. Take 'em down.
translation.it: Via le armi, ragazzi. Mettetele via.

translation.en: [chuckles] Jeez.
Back off, son.
What is going on here?
You in charge of this operation?
I'm General James Harkness. I run this company.
translation.it: Sono il generale James Harkness, dirigo questa compagnia.

translation.en: We have probable cause to believe a crime has been committed.
translation.it: Abbiamo ragione di credere che sia stato commesso un crimine.

translation.en: And you are?
Major Susan Turner. 110th Military Police.
translation.it: Maggiore Susan Turner, Centodecimo Polizia Militare.

translation.en: The Major Turner who's wanted by the MPs for espionage?
translation.it: Quel maggiore Turner, ricercata dalla Polizia Militare per spionaggio?

translation.en: You mean these MPs?
[Turner] These crates are supposed to contain weapons
belonging to the United States Army.
translation.it: di proprietà dell'Esercito degli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: In fact, you sold them to insurgents.
translation.it: Mentre voi le avete vendute agli insorti.

translation.en: And these are now empty.
Do you know who I am, Major?
translation.it: Lei sa chi sono io, maggiore?

translation.en: Yes, General. I do.
You're the man responsible for the deaths of two of my men.
translation.it: Lei è il responsabile della morte di due miei uomini.

translation.en: Now, open up those crates before I grab you by your hair plugs
translation.it: Ora apra quelle casse, oppure la prendo per quei pochi capelli trapiantati

translation.en: and bitch slap that smug look off of your face.
translation.it: e le faccio sparire quell'aria di superiorità a forza di schiaffi.

translation.en: What does the manifest say is in there?
translation.it: Secondo il manifesto di carico, qual è il contenuto?

translation.en: AT4 rocket launchers, sir.
Open it.
Open it.
Open that one.
Open it.
Open it.
Open that one.
I said open up that crate!
translation.it: Ho detto di aprire quella cassa!

translation.en: Open it.
Lieutenant, do your goddamn job
translation.it: Tenente, faccia il suo maledetto lavoro

translation.en: and place this goddamn woman under arrest.
translation.it: e metta questa maledetta donna agli arresti.

translation.en: Sorry, Major, you're gonna need to come with me.
translation.it: Spiacente, maggiore. Deve venire con me.

translation.en: You're right.
The numbers don't add up.
Sir. Sir.
[General Harkness] Stop that man.
-Reacher! -[General Harkness] Stop that man!
[General Harkness] Stop him!
Take him down, now!
-Deep breath, son. -[gun clicks]
Pure opium.
Now the numbers add up.
Get him out of here.
Hello.
Good evening. I'm looking for a man,
a woman and a little blonde teenager.
translation.it: una donna e una ragazzina bionda.

translation.en: I'm so sorry. I don't think I can help you with that type of information.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, non posso dare queste informazioni.

translation.en: I'm looking for two adults and a little blonde girl.
translation.it: Cerco due adulti e una ragazza bionda.

translation.en: Go find their key.
[FBI agent] We have a 4-star general in custody. And it's at least 500 kilos.
translation.it: Abbiamo arrestato un pezzo grosso dell'esercito. Sono almeno 500 chili.

translation.en: Reacher, it's him. He's here.
-What? -At the hotel. Hurry.
Sam, listen to me.
Sam? Sam?
Wait, excuse me!
Hey! What are you doing?
Where are you going? Come back here!
She's not answering.
Try again.
Car, car, car, car!
She's not in the hotel.
-She's in the street. -How do you know?
translation.it: - È per strada. - Come lo sai?

translation.en: Because that's what I would do.
translation.it: Perché è quello che farei io.

translation.en: [Turner] I'll go this way.
Did you see anything?
translation.it: - L'avete vista? - Abbiamo cercato in tutto l'hotel.

translation.en: Searched the whole hotel. We didn't find a trace of her.
translation.it: - L'avete vista? - Abbiamo cercato in tutto l'hotel. - Non c'è traccia di lei. - Si è nascosta.

translation.en: She's gotta be hiding somewhere.
translation.it: - Non c'è traccia di lei. - Si è nascosta.

translation.en: -[dialing] -[line ringing]
-[cell phone ringing] -Reacher.
Let's finish this. Just you and me.
I'm gonna have some fun with your pretty little girl.
translation.it: Mi divertirò un po' con la tua bella bambina.

translation.en: She's not my little girl.
Is that fear I hear in your voice, Jack?
translation.it: È paura quella che sento nella tua voce?

translation.en: I'm gonna break your arms, I'm gonna break your legs. I'm gonna break your neck.
translation.it: Ti spezzerò le braccia, ti spezzerò le gambe, ti spezzerò il collo.

translation.en: What you hear is excitement.
[man] Hey, you! Get out of there!
Come on. Right now. Out.
Nice try, Jack.
I've found a way to hurt you like you've never hurt before.
translation.it: Posso farti soffrire come non hai mai sofferto.

translation.en: -Do you have her? -Chartres Street. Lafitte Hotel.
translation.it: - L'hai trovata? - Chartres Street. Lafitte Hotel.

translation.en: [Turner] Sam, run! Run!
Shoot me and I let go!
Shoot me. Shoot me, Jack.
No? Shoot me!
Parasource is done.
Harkness is in custody.
Congratulations, Jack. I really... I don't give a shit.
translation.it: Congratulazioni, Jack. Non me ne frega un cazzo.

translation.en: Shut up. Shut up!
I told you this would happen.
translation.it: Ti ho detto che sarebbe andata così.

translation.en: You said this was about you and me.
translation.it: Hai detto che è una cosa fra te e me.

translation.en: Put the gun down.
Okay! Okay. Just...
Okay.
If I put down the gun, you let her go.
translation.it: Se butto a terra la pistola, la lasci andare.

translation.en: My life for hers.
translation.it: La mia vita per la sua.

translation.en: No! [sobbing]
I like it.
Deal, Jack.
It's okay, Sam. Look at me.
It's okay. It's the only way.
translation.it: È tutto ok. È l'unico modo.

translation.en: It's okay.
I'm gonna put the gun down now.
You know what this means?
It means we're dead already.
translation.it: Vuol dire che siamo già morti.

translation.en: [The Hunter] Over here.
Kick it over here.
Come on.
Look at me.
You look at me.
[Turner] Hey.
-[Samantha] Is he all right? -Yeah, I think so. Reacher, look here.
translation.it: - Sta bene? - Credo di sì. Reacher, guarda qui.

translation.en: I'm right here.
Can you walk?
Sure.
[Turner] Get the other side.
[Samantha] Dude, you jumped off a building! [Reacher] Yeah, I know.
translation.it: - Ti sei buttato da un palazzo! - Sì, lo so.

translation.en: -[Samantha] Did it hurt? -[Reacher] Yes.
Did you see how high that was?
Can we possibly have this conversation some other time?
translation.it: Possiamo parlarne in un altro momento?

translation.en: Thank you.
You know, it's funny.
You came here looking for one girl and you ended up with another.
translation.it: Sei venuto qui a cercare una ragazza e ne hai trovata un'altra.

translation.en: Let me know how that goes.
I've still got your number.
Bye, Reacher. Major.
Good to see you back, Major.
Thank you, Captain.
Sorry. Bus got stuck in traffic.
translation.it: Scusa, l'autobus è rimasto bloccato nel traffico.

translation.en: New T-shirt. Shut up.
Thanks for coming.
So, Reacher,
are you my father or not?
I guess we'll see when your mother gets here.
translation.it: Lo sapremo quando arriverà tua madre.

translation.en: Sure you'd recognize her?
I tend to remember the women I sleep with.
translation.it: Di solito ricordo le donne con cui vado a letto.

translation.en: But who says she'll remember you? Thanks a lot.
translation.it: - Ma chi dice che lei ricorderà te? - Grazie tante.

translation.en: You're not my father.
Why do you say that?
See that woman over there?
The waitress who's refilled your coffee three times?
translation.it: La cameriera che ti ha servito il caffè tre volte?

translation.en: That's her.
Neither of you had any idea who the other was.
translation.it: Nessuno dei due ha idea di chi sia l'altro.

translation.en: -I knew it all along. -[Reacher] No, you didn't.
translation.it: - L'ho sempre saputo. - No, non lo sapevi.

translation.en: I'm sure you're relieved.
Not really.
You're just gonna go?
That's right.
Don't you ever get lonely?
Sometimes.
Sometimes.
You can call me when you do.
So...
Shouldn't you be...
I'd better go.
Got class.
Drawing.
Yeah, well, you keep that up, because you're really good at it.
translation.it: Beh, continua a disegnare, perché... ...sei davvero brava.

translation.en: You're really good.
You're gonna be okay, kid.
Well...
See you around, Reacher.
